<small>Aramaic form: [[H3769]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכָּר‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Gen.13.10|Gen 13:10]]</sup> [[Exod.29.32|Exod 29:32]] ==a round== : hence 

**1.** a round district. 

**2.** a round loaf. 

**3.** a round weight, talent (Late Hebrew ***id.; loaf, weight, talent***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּכְּרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***talent***; Tel Amarna <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***gaggaru kaspu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>No. 35, Rev. 14</sup> Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, of honey-***comb*** [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 46</sup>; on formative see [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 204</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Gen.13.12|Gen 13:12]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכַּר‎</span> [[1Sam.2.36|1Sam 2:36]] +; dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְּרַיִם כֶּסֶף‎</span> [[1Kgs.16.24|1Kgs 16:24]]; [[2Kgs.5.23|2Kgs 5:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכָּרָ֑יִם‎</span> v[[2Kgs.5.23|2Kgs 5:23]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכָּרִים‎</span> [[1Chr.22.14|1Chr 22:14]] (twice in verse) + 7 t. chr; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְּרֵי‎</span> [[2Kgs.5.5|2Kgs 5:5]] + 2 t. Chronicles; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְּרוֺת‎</span> (***loaves***) [[Judg.8.5|Judg 8:5]]; [[1Sam.10.3|1Sam 10:3]] — 

**1.** ***the round*** (or ***oval***) especially of the Jordan valley, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכַּר הַיַּרְדֵּן‎</span> [[Gen.13.10|Gen 13:10]]; [[Gen.13.11|Gen 13:11]]; [[1Kgs.7.46|1Kgs 7:46]] = [[2Chr.4.17|2Chr 4:17]] absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכִּכָּר‎</span> [[Gen.19.17|Gen 19:17]]; [[Gen.19.25|Gen 19:25]]; [[Deut.34.3|Deut 34:3]]; [[2Sam.18.23|2Sam 18:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ הַכּ‎</span> [[Gen.19.28|Gen 19:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרֵי הַכּ‎</span> [[Gen.13.12|Gen 13:12]]; [[Gen.19.29|Gen 19:29]], see [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]<sup>G 505</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>G. 112</sup>; district of Jerusalem, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכּ‎</span> [[Neh.3.22|Neh 3:22]]; [[Neh.12.28|Neh 12:28]]. 

**2.** ***loaf*** of bread (from round shape), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכַּר לָ֑חֶם‎</span> [[1Sam.2.36|1Sam 2:36]]; , compare [[Exod.29.23|Exod 29:23]]; [[Jer.37.21|Jer 37:21]]; [[1Chr.16.3|1Chr 16:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְּרוֺת לֶחֶם‎</span> [[1Sam.10.3|1Sam 10:3]]; [[Judg.8.5|Judg 8:5]]. 

**3.** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***a weight*** (also from shape), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכַּר עֹפֶרֶת‎</span> [[Zech.5.7|Zech 5:7]] ***a weight of lead***, serving as cover of an ephah. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** a particularunit of weight, ***talent***, usually of gold or silver: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָהָבּ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[2Sam.12.30|2Sam 12:30]]; [[2Kgs.9.14|2Kgs 9:14]] + 18 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.39|1Kgs 20:39]]; [[2Kgs.5.5|2Kgs 5:5]] + 21 t.; but also of iron, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּרְזֶל‎</span> [[1Chr.29.7|1Chr 29:7]], and bronze <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחשֶׁת‎</span> [[Exod.38.29|Exod 38:29]]; [[1Chr.29.7|1Chr 29:7]]. — The weight of the talent was 58.944 kilograms (= 129.97 lbs.) according to older (Babylonian) standard, later 49.11 king (= 108.29 lbs.) and less; see [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 187 ff.</sup> 194 [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 208 f.</sup> — See also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁקֶל‎</span>.
